name: psd2-tpp-demo-app
description: Example application that demonstrates how a TPP could use OP's PSD2 API's
author: Markus Lindqvist

scripts.start: cross-env APP_NAME=oop-tpp-demo-app HOST_ENV=localhost npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run move-static-to-dir
scripts.watch-static-files: nodemon -e pug --watch views --watch public --exec "npm run move-static-to-dir"
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-static-files" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.test: npm run test-ci-kehi && npm run test-ci-jty
scripts.test-ci-kehi: cross-env APP_ENVIRONMENT=dev APP_NAME=oop-tpp-demo-app HOST_ENV=localhost jest test-kehi --forceExit --verbose --detectOpenHandles --ci --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit
scripts.test-ci-jty: cross-env APP_ENVIRONMENT=test APP_NAME=oop-tpp-demo-app HOST_ENV=localhost jest test-jty --forceExit --verbose --detectOpenHandles --ci --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
